member.name: SP_CLASSIMAGELIST_DATA
member.summary: An SP_CLASSIMAGELIST_DATA structure describes a class image list.

member.name: SP_CLASSIMAGELIST_DATA.cbSize
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the SP_CLASSIMAGE_DATA structure.

member.name: SP_CLASSIMAGELIST_DATA.ImageList
member.summary: A handle to the class image list.
